name: Adonis, story of love and death
name_original: Adonis, story of love and death
description:
Adonis, a story about love and death...

Incarnate Adonis, the spirit of a familiar who was separated from his witch when they died. He will then try to save the soul of his former mistress by going to appease her, suffering from an endless mourning...

This project was created in duo by :
Orson Captainsass https://www.artstation.com/mrcaptain 
Helena HB (me) https://www.artstation.com/helenahb 

We hope you will enjoy this adventure!
